name: greyly
content:
greyly adverb
(COLOUR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
with a grey colour: The buildings squat greyly at the end of the street. There were jagged mountains, with more mountains looming greyly behind them.
in a way that involves cloudy weather, with not much light: The rain drifted greyly past. The grey sky drizzled, greyly, into the grey river below.
